Style.name: linie_dol
Style.Rule: &maxscale_zoom16; ([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'road') and not [tunnel]>='' and not ([surface] = 'unpaved' or [surface] = 'artificial_turf' or [surface] = 'compacted' or [surface] = 'concrete:lanes' or [surface] = 'dirt earth' or [surface] = 'fine_gravel' or [surface] = 'grass' or [surface] = 'grass_paver' or [surface] = 'gravel' or [surface] = 'ground' or [surface] = 'mud' or [surface] = 'pebblestone' or [surface] = 'sand' or [surface] = 'wood' or [surface] = 'clay')

&maxscale_zoom16; ([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'road') and ([surface] = 'unpaved' or [surface] = 'artificial_turf' or [surface] = 'compacted' or [surface] = 'concrete:lanes' or [surface] = 'dirt earth' or [surface] = 'fine_gravel' or [surface] = 'grass' or [surface] = 'grass_paver' or [surface] = 'gravel' or [surface] = 'ground' or [surface] = 'mud' or [surface] = 'pebblestone' or [surface] = 'sand' or [surface] = 'wood' or [surface] = 'clay')

&maxscale_zoom16; ( [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] ='road' or [highway] = 'service' or [highway] = 'living_street' or [highway] = 'pedestrian') and [bridge] >=''

&maxscale_zoom16; ([highway] = 'service' and not ([surface] = 'unpaved' or [surface] = 'artificial_turf' or [surface] = 'compacted' or [surface] = 'concrete:lanes' or [surface] = 'dirt earth' or [surface] = 'fine_gravel' or [surface] = 'grass' or [surface] = 'grass_paver' or [surface] = 'gravel' or [surface] = 'ground' or [surface] = 'mud' or [surface] = 'pebblestone' or [surface] = 'sand' or [surface] = 'wood' or [surface] = 'clay')) and not [tunnel]>=''

&maxscale_zoom16; ([highway] = 'service' and ([surface] = 'unpaved' or [surface] = 'artificial_turf' or [surface] = 'compacted' or [surface] = 'concrete:lanes' or [surface] = 'dirt earth' or [surface] = 'fine_gravel' or [surface] = 'grass' or [surface] = 'grass_paver' or [surface] = 'gravel' or [surface] = 'ground' or [surface] = 'mud' or [surface] = 'pebblestone' or [surface] = 'sand' or [surface] = 'wood' or [surface] = 'clay') or [tracktype] = 'grade1') and not [tunnel]>=''

Style.name: drogi_lokalne
Style.Rule: &maxscale_zoom16; ([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'road' ) and not [tunnel]>='' and not ([surface] = 'paving_stones' or [surface] = 'cobblestone' or [surface] = 'sett')
&maxscale_zoom16; ([highway] = 'service' or [tracktype] = 'grade1') and not [tunnel]>='' and not ([surface] = 'paving_stones' or [surface] = 'cobblestone' or [surface] = 'sett')
&maxscale_zoom16; ([highway] = 'service' or [tracktype] = 'grade1') and not [tunnel]>='' and ([surface] = 'paving_stones' or [surface] = 'cobblestone' or [surface] = 'sett')

&maxscale_zoom16; [highway] = 'living_street' or [highway] = 'pedestrian' or (([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'road') and ([surface] = 'paving_stones' or [surface] = 'cobblestone' or [surface] = 'sett'))

Style.name: refy_drog
pokrycie_terenu_dol
pokrycie_terenu_gora_obwodki
Style.Rule: &maxscale_zoom13; ([landuse] = 'cemetery' or [landuse] = 'grave_yard' or [amenity] = 'grave_yard' and not [religion]>'') or (([landuse] = 'cemetery' or [amenity] = 'grave_yard') and [religion] = 'christian')

Style.name: pokrycie_terenu_drogi_dol
Style.Rule: &maxscale_zoom14; [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'road' or [highway] = 'service' or [highway] = 'track' or [highway] = 'path' or [highway] = 'cycleway'

Style.name: pokrycie_terenu_gora
Style.Rule: &maxscale_zoom13; ([landuse] = 'cemetery' or [landuse] = 'grave_yard' or [amenity] = 'grave_yard' and not [religion]>'') or (([landuse] = 'cemetery' or [amenity] = 'grave_yard') and [religion] = 'christian')

Style.name: pokrycie_terenu_drogi_gora
Style.Rule: &maxscale_zoom14; [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'road' or [highway] = 'service' or [highway] = 'track' or [highway] = 'path' or [highway] = 'cycleway'

Style.name: sport
Style.Rule: &maxscale_zoom16; [sport] = 'soccer' and [angle_diff] > 85 and [angle_diff] < 95 and [diagonal] > 80 and [longer] > [diagonal] * 0.6 and [longer] < [diagonal] and [shorter] > [diagonal] * 0.3 and [shorter] < [diagonal] * 0.8

&maxscale_zoom17; ([sport] = 'tennis' or [leisure] = 'court') and [angle_diff] > 80 and [angle_diff] < 100 and [diagonal] > 30 and [longer] > [diagonal] * 0.6 and [longer] < [diagonal] and [shorter] > [diagonal] * 0.3 and [shorter] < [diagonal] * 0.6

&maxscale_zoom17; [sport] = 'basketball' and [angle_diff] > 80 and [angle_diff] < 100 and [diagonal] > 30 and [longer] > [diagonal] * 0.7 and [longer] < [diagonal] and [shorter] > [diagonal] * 0.3 and [shorter] < [diagonal] * 0.6

Style.name: budynki
Style.Rule: &maxscale_zoom16; [building] = 'church' or [building] = 'school' or [building] = 'hotel' or [building] = 'hostel' or [building] = 'classroom' or [building] = 'commercial' or [building] = 'office' or [building] = 'offices' or [building] = 'retail' or [building] = 'station'

Style.name: nazwy_poligonow

Layer.name: pokrycie_terenu_dol
pokrycie_terenu_dol_lasy_dol
Layer.Datasource:
&datasource-settings; planet_osm_polygon
(SELECT way, way_area FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE (landuse = 'forest' OR "natural" = 'wood' OR landuse = 'wood') AND way_area >= 250000) AS lasy way

Layer.name: pokrycie_terenu_gora_obwodki
pokrycie_terenu_gora
pokrycie_terenu_drogi_dol
cieki
cieki10i11
zbiorniki_wodne
linie_dol_lores
linie_dol
pokrycie_terenu_drogi_gora
budynki
admin_lores
sciezki
koleje
zjazdy
drogi_lokalne
drogi_powiatowe
drogi_wojewodzkie
drogi_glowne_lores
drogi_glowne
transport_publiczny
sport
Layer.Datasource: &datasource-settings; ( SELECT *, abs(a12 - a23) AS angle_diff, (a12 + a23 + CASE WHEN d12 > d23 THEN 90 ELSE 270 END) / 2 AS angle, GREATEST(d12, d23) AS longer, LEAST(d12, d23) AS shorter, (|/ way_area) * 690 / 100 / (ST_XMax(!bbox!) - ST_XMin(!bbox!)) AS scale -- sqrt(area)(== wall length) * 1:1 tile size / 1:1 wall length / (1/scale) FROM ( SELECT *, ST_NPoints(way2) AS nb, ST_Distance(ST_PointN(way2, 1), ST_PointN(way2, 2)) AS d12, ST_Distance(ST_PointN(way2, 3), ST_PointN(way2, 2)) AS d23, ST_Distance(ST_PointN(way2, 1), ST_PointN(way2, 3)) AS diagonal, degrees(ST_Azimuth(ST_PointN(way2, 1), ST_PointN(way2, 2))) AS a12, degrees(ST_Azimuth(ST_PointN(way2, 2), ST_PointN(way2, 3))) AS a23 FROM ( SELECT *, ST_Area(way) AS way_area, ST_ExteriorRing(ST_SimplifyPreserveTopology(way, 50)) AS way2 FROM ( SELECT (ST_Dump(way)).geom AS way, leisure, sport FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE (sport IN ('tennis', 'soccer', 'basketball', 'rugby', 'rugby_union', 'rugby_league', 'american_football') OR leisure = 'court') AND way && !bbox! ) AS dump ) AS simplified ) AS simplified2 ) AS sport way
